column5: It's been a while since i have posted anything but a comment or two,mainly becuse of computer problems at home[fried motherboard] and building a new network at work. so about a month and a half ago my two kids finally convinced my wife. now i have a new fishing buddy.
Looks like a Border collie am I correct? Amy ( my dog ) has been the best traveling companion and fishing buddy for me over the last 5 years you won't regret this.
Cute little thing....gonna keep you very busy
Sorry guy's im getting used to the new board..and yes she's keeping me very busy
Nice looking dog.
Sweet looking pup. You will need lots of time with her/him. My buddies border collie WILL not let him out of her sight. Has the primo seat when out in the boat.
Nice looking friend there.....congrats!  dk
Very Nice,  I love having a dog in the boat.  My buddy is my best fishing partner yet.. except when she steas my lunch..
LOL    ...
nice dog.... my collie hated my boat, just didn't like it on the water, so I shot her  not really, she grew old and just never enjoyed my hobby maybe my next one will be a fishing partner
I got two...

Terry  "i don't need to ask how you hijacked that aviator" man i would take two dogs in a hartbeat,grew up with Newfoundlands and collies, but after 22 years of marrage my wife finally said ok [really got to thank my two girls]
Nice puppy!   Many happy fishing years together!!  bly
Cute looking fishing partner.  We will begin looking for one after getting back from holidays in January.

Nothing like having a dog following you everywhere.  I take mine wherever I go.  I used to have a LabXsheppard that I couldnt take fishing because without fail everytime I casted he was off and swimming for the lure before it hit the water.
Nice pup. Sherriff
Here is my bud
This is my Border Collie, her name is Miss Bubba... a good southern name!
This little girl's name is "chase"
One word  ADORABLE!!  You are certainly going to have ur hands full thats for sure...lol
Nice lookin pup. By chance were you fishing the Notty yesterday?  Later, RF

i wish ,i was going to hit sturgeon yesterday for the closer but my buddy is leaving for Texas on friday morning,seems he want's to go see a couple of football games instead of fishing.BRING ON THE ICE .
